main event: Several citizens of Garfield, New Jersey reported an unidentified flying object (UFO) sighting on July 13, 1968, describing it as saucer-shaped and emitting flashing lights, hovering for approximately 10 minutes.
interesting points: The sighting lasted approximately 10 minutes., The object was described as being saucer-shaped., It emitted flashing lights., The report was filed by the Garfield Police Department., Colonel Frank Bona was the investigator for the case.
witness description: Several citizens of Garfield, New Jersey
